subject: Re: [junit] Can any friend tell me about how to simulate  HttpServletRequest & HttpServeltResponse & HttpSenssion.
msgSnippet: ... Check out cactus at jakarta.apache.org. It ll do what you want. -- *   Jim Cheesman   * Trabajo: jchees@msl.es - (34)(91) 724 9200 x 2360 Perspective is in
messageBody:
At 09:31 AM 07/11/01, you wrote:
>For our project is base on Servlet&Jsp tech, and we want to unit test out
>class.
>When a class use HttpServletRequest & HttpServetResponse object, and I
>test it not under the real enginee(tomcat).How to construct a request and
>response and session?
>


Check out cactus at jakarta.apache.org. It'll do what you want.



--

* Jim Cheesman *

the eye of the beholder.
